message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $95. I believe it's a fantastic deal and worth every penny.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my spending under $100. Would you consider lowering the price to $85?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I can't go as low as $85.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $90?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Unfortunately, I am still not able to meet at $90. Could we perhaps aim for $87?
